EmailTemplate.description: Use this template as an auto-response informing the customer that a Case has been opened. Appearing as a system-generated email, this template contains instructions to update the Case by entering a reply within designated markers to make for the cleanest case comment, free of signature text. Includes merge fields for the auto-population of Case Number, Status, Priority Level, Subject, and Description.
EmailTemplate.name: New Case Auto Response w/ Markers (text)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} {!Case.E2CP__Case_Thread_Id__c}
